jadex.testcases.semiautomatic
Agent TestCenter

jadex.testcases.semiautomatic.TestCenter
  • jadex.planlib.TestCenter
  • jadex.planlib.AMS
    • agent TestCenter
    contains jadex.planlib.TestCenter

    Perform tests.

    The test center agent has the purpose to perform tests and collect the results.
